name: GD64 Group Projects
description:
This is a compilation page of VFS' GD64 Program's Projects as a backup of the VFS Arcade pages. Please see the credits below for all the projects.

 

We students appreciate you wanting to try out our games!

Vancouver Film School (VFS)'s Game Design Program is a One-year Intensive Post-Secondary Program where students experience the entire game development cycle and develop specialized skills in coding, game art, and level design.

♔ = Won Best Project

Team Project List (Mid Year) (3 Months) Frankenswoon - Platformer Team: Gee Sharma, Jeff Howe, Frances Granger, Meadow Chaput, Pedro (Cid) Santos Faria Mow ‘Em Down - Platformer Team: Tomas Moraes, Ethan Loconte, João Pedro Gabrine dos Reis, Kane Grad Shaping The Future - 2 Player Co-op Platformer Team: Rory Wan, Karan Dhaliwal, Justin Choy, Larry  Xiao SugarRush Defenders - Horde Survival Team: Rhys Hughes, Travis Fichtner, Brianna Thorne, Evan Zagorac Trials of Anubis ♔ - Platformer Team: Koda Villela, Andy Vu,  James Hicks, Josh Estillore   Final Project List (6 Months) Crescent Valley - Melee Horde Fighting Team: Rory Wan, Evan Zagorac, Frances Granger, Josh Estillore, Karan Dhaliwal
Collab: Dhruv Merai, Rodrigo Enoque Grim Keeper - Hack 'n Slash Team: Gee Sharma, Andy Vu, João Pedro Gabrine dos Reis, Justin Choy, Rhys Hughes, Jeff Howe
Collab: Kevin Stiles, Chris Albert, Brandon Bec, Ryan Chabrel-Davis, Jairo Valencia Let Me Rest ♔ - Puzzle Adventure Team: Tomas Moraes, Kane Grad, Brianna Thorne, James Hicks, Travis Fichtner
Collab: Sandy Park, Ben Sousae, Pawat Weerasethakul, Tatiana Queiroz Monster Med - Tower Defense Team: Meadow Chaput, Ethan Loconte, Koda Villela, Larry  Xiao
Collab: Narissarin Janpraisri, Shashwat Rebound - Multidirectional Shooter Team: Pedro (Cid) Santos Faria
